about_the_game:
Immerse Yourself in Medieval Life with The Tavern Tales!

In The Tavern Tales, you become the owner of a small, old tavern inherited from your family. Numerous opportunities and challenges await, helping you turn it into a thriving hub of city life:

  • Tavern Management: Purchase ingredients, take orders, prepare dishes, and serve drinks, personally engaging in every process.

  • Licenses and Recipes: Acquire licenses to sell alcohol, learn new recipes for food and drinks, and experiment with exotic options that may lead to unexpected results.

  • Interior Improvement: Add tables, chairs, decorations, and other design elements to attract more guests and create a cozy atmosphere.

  • Garden: Take care of your garden, grow produce, and earn more by selling it or using it in cooking.

  • Expeditions: Send sailors to distant lands for exotic resources, seeds, decorations, and recipes. But be cautious — not all discoveries are safe.

  • Serving the Elite: Don’t forget to please important guests, or the consequences may be unpleasant.

  • Notice Board: Keep an eye on city news and announcements — they might influence your strategy.

    Every action you take matters. Manage your tavern, tend to your garden, send out expeditions, and interact with city residents. Your decisions will shape the reputation and growth of your business.

Become the master of your destiny.

Expand your tavern’s possibilities by adding new services and decor elements. Enhance it and transform it into a gathering place for all social classes.

In The Tavern Tales, you’ll experience a variety of engaging events and content:

  • Build your path to success by interacting with different social strata.

  • Explore exotic recipes and resources that could change the course of the game.

  • Participate in city events and respond to unexpected challenges.

Create Your Story of Success

The Tavern Tales is an exciting story of how a small, old tavern becomes a thriving center of life in a medieval city. Your efforts, decisions, and actions will determine the future of the establishment and create a legend to be remembered for centuries.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: TbD
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TbD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: TbD
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TbD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Tavern Tales: Medieval Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX VEGA-56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in medieval life with The Tavern Tales! Manage your tavern, tend to your garden, cook meals, send expeditions, and serve the elite. Upgrade your establishment, explore new recipes, and leave your mark on history by creating a legend of your time!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Ukrainian, Japanese
